ARABIC: أَمْرًا مِّنْ عِندِنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرْسِلِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: by a command from Our presence. We are constantly sending out
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: As commands from Us. It is indeed We who send (messengers),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: by Our command. Verily, We were set to send a Messenger
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The command that We have been sending
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: By a command from Us – indeed it is We Who send.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: As a command from Us. Verily, We are ever sending,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: A command from Us; surely We are the senders (of apostles),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: determined as a bidding from Us, (We are ever sending)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: As a command from Our presence - Lo! We are ever sending -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: by Our own command -- We have been sending messages,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: As a command from before Us. Verily We were to become senders:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: as an ordinance from Us. We have been sending [apostles]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: By command, from Our Presence. For We (ever) send (revelations),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Amran (i.e. a Command or this Quran or the Decree of every matter) from Us. Verily, We are ever sending (the Messengers),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: an order from Us. We are ever sending.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: A decree from Us. We have been sending messages.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Every] matter [proceeding] from Us. Indeed, We were to send [a messenger]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [44:5] As an ordinance, a distinguishing, from Us. Indeed We have been sending from your Lord, messengers, [such as] Muhammad (s) and those before him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (As a command from Our presence) an exposition from Us: We explain to Gabriel, Michael, Seraphiel and the angel of death what they are entrusted with from year to year. (Lo! We are ever sending) messengers with Scriptures.
